attributes.action: Stop the fireworks with large bangs. These sudden noises scare pets and children
attributes.additional_details: Make our pets, children and elderly from being scared in their own homes.
attributes.background: Stop the sales or import of fireworks that create lound bangs and allow the quiet ones.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Review and reduce the decibel limit on fireworks sold to the public
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549758
